data.text: The memorial of Josiah is like the composition of incense
He behaved himself uprightly in the conversion of the people,
He set his heart right toward the Lord;
Except David and Hezekiah and Josiah,
For they gave their Gr. horn.  power unto others,
They set on fire the chosen city of the sanctuary,
It was  Ezekiel who saw the vision of glory,
For verily he remembered the enemies in Gr. rain.  storm,
Also of the twelve prophets The remainder of this line is omitted by the best authorities.
So was Jesus the son of Josedek:
Also of Nehemiah the memorial is great;
No man was created upon the earth such as was Enoch;
Neither was there a man born like unto Joseph,
Shem and Seth were glorified among men;
